posts.post_content:
Have for trade or sale.
Payment by USPS MO, sorry no paypal. I ship priority USPS w/DC,insured. 
Would like to trade if possible. If your interested in buying, throw me a price your comfortable with. If I cant trade, I will probably keep em, but wont prevent someone from owning if they would rather purchase. Trade/cash works for me also. Backs are SC or Pied.

Christy Mathewson sgc40 *sold*
Addie Joss psa3 *sold*
Frank Chance[yellow] psa4 *sold*
Mordecai Brown sgc45 *sold*
Johnny Evers sgc50 *sold*
Chief Bender psa4 *sold*

Open to looking at trade lists of pre-war HoFers.

Jeff,

PM sent on Brown.

Mike

PM's returned, sorry for delay. Will be home for the night after 6pm ET. 

Frank Chance Yellow has been sold. Will edit for sale.

Beautiful cards, Jeff. Wow! The new owner of the Chief Bender is getting a heck of an addition to their collection. 

Good luck with your sales!
Hi Bill! Thank you sir. The Evers and Bender are really sharp for thier respective grades.
